ygData.subject: Re: new rogue abilites
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m not going to complain if they fix the Rogue class, we re all better off.  Anyhow, the throwing bit impacts us - more throwable objects trickles down.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm not going to complain if they fix the Rogue class, we're all better
off. Anyhow, the throwing bit impacts us - more throwable objects trickles
down.

Yeah throwing is kind of a joke, but throwing axes have a range of 120 and
if you're pulling that easily outdistances our targetable songs - the they
were stackable it'd be even better. Can you tell I'm trying to justify all
those hours of begging magicians for daggers and then looking like a drunken
darts player? =)

-GW
<Tork@Nameless>

PS: Was fooling around with track last night and mashed it... Shardwing
pop'd up on radar. :)
